  • メソッド
jp.llv.flaggame.api.player

インタフェース PlayerAPI<P extends GamePlayer>

  • 型パラメータ:
    P - a Player type this manager accepts
    すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    Iterable<P>
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    PlayerManager

    public interface PlayerAPI<P extends GamePlayer>
extends Iterable<P>
    作成者:
    toyblocks

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      P getPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Return the game player of the bukkit player.
      P getPlayer(String name)
      Return the game player with the given name.
      P getPlayer(UUID uuid)
      Returns the game player with the given UUID.
      Collection<P> getPlayers()
      Returns all game players.
      Collection<P> getPlayersIn(org.bukkit.World world)
      Returns all game players in the given world.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getPlayer

        P getPlayer(UUID uuid)
        Returns the game player with the given UUID.
        パラメータ:
        uuid - the uuid of the player to retrieve, nullable
        戻り値:
        the player if the player is online or in a game, otherwise null

      • getPlayer

        P getPlayer(String name)
        Return the game player with the given name.
        パラメータ:
        name - the name of the player to retrieve, null means noone
        戻り値:
        the player if the player is online or in a game, otherwise null

      • getPlayer

        P getPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Return the game player of the bukkit player.
        パラメータ:
        player - the bukkit player, who has the uuid of the game player
        戻り値:
        the player if the player is online or in a game, otherwise null.

      • getPlayers

        Collection<P> getPlayers()
        Returns all game players.
        戻り値:
        all game players

      • getPlayersIn

        Collection<P> getPlayersIn(org.bukkit.World world)
        Returns all game players in the given world.
        パラメータ:
        world - the world where players are, null means nowhere
        戻り値:
        all game players in the world
